metadata.documentation: The dataset includes post-processed model outputs from regional configuration simulations (control and PGW) using the MPAS-A version 8.0.1. This is the first dataset publicly available that uses regional MPAS in combination with the PGW approach to study future climate in short time scales. The Limited-Area domain encompasses 30 degree South to 51 degree North and 3 km horizontal grid outputs, the post-processed outputs available here were interpolated to a 0.25-degree by 0.25-degree latitude-by-longitude grid and 27 isobaric levels (in the vertical). The namelist files to run the model, as well as a README file, are also included in this repository. More details of the data and analysis are published in the Geophysical Research Letters (GRL): Nunez Ocasio and Dougherty, 2024: https://doi.org/10.1029/2024GL112341
